original: 東吳末期大將，晉滅吳時為前將軍，奉命鎮守與建業互為依託的石頭城，但因吳軍士氣低迷，不願為孫皓效死，開城投降。
text: General at the end of the Eastern Wu Dynasty. He was a former general during the Jin Dynasty and eliminated Wu Shi. He was ordered to guard the Stone City, which was mutually dependent on Jianye. However, due to the low morale of Wu's army, he was unwilling to die for Sun Hao and Kaicheng surrendered.
